actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require appropriate tests before a food additive may be banned as inducing cancer in man or animal and to permit the marketing of such an additive with appropriate warning labeling.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require appropriate tests before a food additive may be banned as inducing cancer in man or animal, and to permit the marketing of such an additive with appropriate warning labeling.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require appropriate tests before a food additive may be banned as inducing cancer in man or animal and to permit the marketing of such an additive with appropriate warning labeling.
